verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> in the <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H6144>Ar<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> is <S%H7901>laid<s%> <S%H7703>waste,<s%> and <S%H1820>brought<s%> to <S%H1820>silence;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> in the <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H7024>Kir<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> is laid <S%H7703>waste,<s%> and <S%H1820>brought<s%> to <S%H1820>silence;<s%>

He is <S%H5927>gone<s%> up to <S%H1006>Bajith,<s%> and to <S%H1769>Dibon,<s%> the <S%H1116>high<s%> places, to <S%H1065>weep:<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall <S%H3213>howl<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H5015>Nebo,<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H4311>Medeba:<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H7218>heads<s%> shall be <S%H7144>baldness,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2206>beard<s%> <S%H1438>cut<s%> off.

In their <S%H2351>streets<s%> they shall <S%H2296>gird<s%> themselves with <S%H8242>sackcloth:<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H1406>tops<s%> of their houses, and in their <S%H7339>streets,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one shall <S%H3213>howl,<s%> <S%H1065>weeping<s%> <S%H3381>abundantly.<s%>

And <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> shall <S%H2199>cry,<s%> and <S%H500>Elealeh:<s%> their <S%H6963>voice<s%> shall be <S%H8085>heard<s%> even to <S%H3096>Jahaz:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H2502>armed<s%> <S%H2502>soldiers<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall <S%H7321>cry<s%> out; his <S%H5315>life<s%> shall be <S%H3415>grievous<s%> to him.

My <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H2199>cry<s%> out for <S%H4124>Moab;<s%> his <S%H1280>fugitives<s%> shall flee to <S%H6820>Zoar,<s%> an <S%H5697>heifer<s%> of <S%H7992>three<s%> years <S%H7992>old:<s%> for by the <S%H4608>mounting<s%> up of <S%H3872>Luhith<s%> with <S%H1065>weeping<s%> shall they <S%H5927>go<s%> it up; for in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2773>Horonaim<s%> they shall <S%H5782>raise<s%> up a <S%H2201>cry<s%> of <S%H7667>destruction.<s%>

For the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5249>Nimrim<s%> shall be <S%H4923>desolate:<s%> for the <S%H2682>hay<s%> is <S%H3001>withered<s%> away, the <S%H1877>grass<s%> <S%H3615>fails,<s%> there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3418>green<s%> thing.

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H3502>abundance<s%> they have <S%H6213>gotten,<s%> and that which they have <S%H6486>laid<s%> up, shall they <S%H5375>carry<s%> away to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of the <S%H6155>willows.<s%>

For the <S%H2201>cry<s%> is <S%H5362>gone<s%> <S%H5362>round<s%> about the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab;<s%> the <S%H3213>howling<s%> thereof to <S%H97>Eglaim,<s%> and the <S%H3213>howling<s%> thereof to <S%H879>Beerelim.<s%>

For the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H1775>Dimon<s%> shall be <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1818>blood:<s%> for I will <S%H7896>bring<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> on <S%H1775>Dimon,<s%> <S%H738>lions<s%> on him that <S%H6413>escapes<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and on the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H127>land.<s%>
